Title: Provides for the authority of the department of health to engage in or support research on the health effects of artificial night light
Summary: Provides for authority of the department of health to engage in or support research on the health effects of artificial night light.
LawCode: Amd ยง201, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to research relating to the health effects of artificial night light
